name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John SIGER, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed at No. 369 January Term, 1978. Judgment of sentence affirmed at No. 80-3-822.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert F. Simone, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Stephen B. Harris, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 932
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. John SIGER, Appellant.
